attributes.action: Create Downing Street Tours For Students Studying Government + Politics At School.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create Downing Street Tours For Students Studying Government + Politics At School.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct commincation with the Prime Minister or the Prime Minister's office please go to http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us to find out how to contact the Prime Minister.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
